query:
INSERT INTO blog_posts (title, slug, content, excerpt, author, category, tags, featured_image, published_at) VALUES ('Understanding Hormone Balance: A Comprehensive Guide', 'understanding-hormone-balance', '

The Importance of Hormonal Health

Hormones are chemical messengers that regulate virtually every function in your body. From metabolism to mood, sleep to reproduction, hormones play a crucial role in maintaining optimal health.

Common Hormone Imbalances

Many people experience hormone imbalances at some point in their lives. These can manifest as fatigue, weight gain, mood swings, and other symptoms.

How EndoGuard Can Help

EndoGuard uses AI-powered analysis to identify potential hormone imbalances and provide personalized recommendations for improvement.

', 'Discover how hormones affect your health and what you can do about imbalances', 'Dr. Pamela Tebebi-Njoh', 'hormone-health', '["hormones", "health", "endocrine"]', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1576091160550-2173dba999ef?w=800', NOW()), ('New AI Features in EndoGuard: What You Need to Know', 'new-ai-features-endoguard', '

Advanced AI Analysis

Our latest update introduces groundbreaking AI capabilities that provide deeper insights into your hormone health.

Personalized Recommendations

The new system learns from your data to provide increasingly personalized health recommendations.

Getting Started

Log in to your account to access the new features today.

', 'Learn about the latest AI-powered features in EndoGuard platform', 'Nexus Team', 'platform-updates', '["AI", "features", "update"]', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1677442d019cecf8f80f1a18f0e63ce8cb0d4b86?w=800', NOW()), ('The Role of Endocrinology in Modern Healthcare', 'endocrinology-modern-healthcare', '

Understanding Endocrinology

Endocrinology is the medical specialty that focuses on hormones and the glands that produce them.

Clinical Applications

Modern endocrinology has evolved to include advanced diagnostic tools and personalized treatment approaches.

The Future

AI and technology are revolutionizing how we approach endocrine health.

', 'Explore the latest advances in endocrinology and hormone-related treatments', 'Dr. Sarah Mitchell', 'clinical-research', '["endocrinology", "research", "clinical"]', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1576091160399-112ba8d25d1d?w=800', NOW()), ('Patient Success Story: Finding Balance with EndoGuard', 'patient-success-story-endoguard', '

Maria''s Journey

Maria struggled with unexplained fatigue and weight gain for years. After using EndoGuard, she discovered she had a thyroid imbalance.

The Transformation

With personalized recommendations from EndoGuard, Maria was able to work with her healthcare provider to address the root cause.

Results

Within three months, Maria reported improved energy levels and better overall health.

', 'Read how EndoGuard helped one patient discover the root cause of her health issues', 'Maria Rodriguez', 'patient-stories', '["success", "story", "transformation"]', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1631217314831-c6227db76b6e?w=800', NOW()), ('5 Daily Habits for Better Hormone Health', 'daily-habits-hormone-health', '

1. Prioritize Sleep

Quality sleep is essential for hormone regulation. Aim for 7-9 hours per night.

2. Manage Stress

Chronic stress disrupts hormone balance. Practice meditation, yoga, or other relaxation techniques.

3. Eat Whole Foods

Nutritious foods support healthy hormone production and metabolism.

4. Exercise Regularly

Physical activity helps regulate hormones and improve overall health.

5. Stay Hydrated

Water is essential for all bodily functions, including hormone regulation.

', 'Simple daily habits you can adopt to support better hormone health and balance', 'Wellness Coach', 'health-tips', '["habits", "wellness", "health"]', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506126613408-eca07ce68773?w=800', NOW());

Understanding Endocrinology

Endocrinology is the medical specialty that focuses on hormones and the glands that produce them.

Clinical Applications

Modern endocrinology has evolved to include advanced diagnostic tools and personalized treatment approaches.

The Future

AI and technology are revolutionizing how we approach endocrine health.

', 'Explore the latest advances in endocrinology and hormone-related treatments', 'Dr. Sarah Mitchell', 'clinical-research', '["endocrinology", "research", "clinical"]', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1576091160399-112ba8d25d1d?w=800', NOW()), ('Patient Success Story: Finding Balance with EndoGuard', 'patient-success-story-endoguard', '

Results

', 'Read how EndoGuard helped one patient discover the root cause of her health issues', 'Maria Rodriguez', 'patient-stories', '["success", "story", "transformation"]', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1631217314831-c6227db76b6e?w=800', NOW()), ('5 Daily Habits for Better Hormone Health', 'daily-habits-hormone-health', '

1. Prioritize Sleep

Quality sleep is essential for hormone regulation. Aim for 7-9 hours per night.

2. Manage Stress

Chronic stress disrupts hormone balance. Practice meditation, yoga, or other relaxation techniques.

3. Eat Whole Foods

Nutritious foods support healthy hormone production and metabolism.

4. Exercise Regularly

Physical activity helps regulate hormones and improve overall health.

5. Stay Hydrated

Water is essential for all bodily functions, including hormone regulation.

', 'Simple daily habits you can adopt to support better hormone health and balance', 'Wellness Coach', 'health-tips', '["habits", "wellness", "health"]', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506126613408-eca07ce68773?w=800', NOW());
